conversations.conversation: Hi friends am WILYKISS,I'm cool gentle looking....love friends who are good in understanding and caring...Ready to play always, but God fearing in me when am out there with friends...Look at myself when am looking wrong to people i love....always say the and pet it...must of all i like pretty girls out there yea me smile get best of me cox am afraid of heart break.....am still Williams...........I do the best i can in life cox am ready to get to the top to learn from what i had am clad to met you guy'z out there..............WILYKISS....!
